attributes.action: Removing the ban on female ejaculation from British-produced porn
attributes.additional_details:
"The Audiovisual Media Services Regulations 2014 requires that video-on-demand (VoD) online porn now adhere to the same guidelines laid out for DVD sex shop-type porn by the British Board of Film Censors (BBFC)."

Female ejaculation is included among the acts that are effectively banned from being depicted in British porn.

By classifying female ejaculation as a kink or perversion we ought to protect the general public from, the British Government is doing two things:

1. Keeping the sexual equality clock over half a century behind.  Female ejaculation is treated as a kind of unnatural perversion, whereas male ejaculation is "normal".

2. Shaming that small but statistically significant percentage of women for whom ejaculation is a natural and normal part of sexual enjoyment.


http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/a-long-list-of-sex-acts-just-got-banned-in-uk-porn-9897174.html

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Female_ejaculation
